thread.title: What Kind Of Sex He Secretly Wants To Have, Based On His Zodiac Sign
thread.title_full: What Kind Of Sex He Secretly Wants To Have, Based On His Zodiac Sign

author: Holly Riordan
title: What Kind Of Sex He Secretly Wants To Have, Based On His Zodiac Sign
text:
God & Man
Aries : March 21st – April 19th He’s dying to be a little taboo and try anal sex, but he’s afraid that you’ll say it’s out of the question and swat him away.
Taurus : April 20th – May 20th He wants to have morning sex, where you run your hands over his morning wood and then ride him while he’s still half-asleep.
Gemini : May 21st – June 20th He would never admit it, but he’s been dying to have a threesome with you and the woman of your choosing.
Cancer : June 21st – July 22nd He secretly wishes that you would go down on him more, because oral sex — or more specifically, 69ing — is his favorite type of sex.
Leo : July 23rd – August 22nd He’s bored of having sex in the bedroom and wants to do it somewhere public for a change, like inside of his office or in the back of a movie theater.
Virgo : August 23rd – September 22nd He’s secretly sick of being in control and wants to have lazy sex where you do all the work and he can just lean back and relax.
Libra : September 23rd – October 22nd As much as he loves long, lust-filled nights, he secretly wants to have a quickie with you before he leaves for work every morning.
Scorpio : October 23rd – November 21st He wants to have drunken sex with you, so that you’re less tense than usual, but he doesn’t want to feel like he’s taking advantage of you.
Sagittarius : November 22nd – December 21st He wants to have rough sex with you, where he calls you a slut and you scratch up his back.
Capricorn : December 22nd – January 19th He wants to have hot sex that involves bondage — handcuffs, ball gags, blindfolds, the works.
Aquarius : January 20th – February 18th He has a creative mind, which is why he wants to slip into a character and roleplay as a fireman or a stripper during sex.
Pisces : February 19th – March 20th He’s afraid it will make him sound less manly, but he wants to have gentle sex where you hold him close and stare deeply into his eyes.
